params._user: Address of the user whose uninvested amount needs to be calculated.

returns._0: Boolean indicating working status of core.

params._token: Address of the underlying token to be deposited into dHedge pool.

params._message: Message reason for reactivation of the core.

params._user: Address of the user whose stream needs to be closed.

params._token: Address of the pool token. TODO Remove/Modify this function after testing

returns._0: Index ID of first permanent index.
returns._1: Index ID of second permanent index.
returns._3: Index ID of the locked index.

params._token: Address of the underlying token for which the permanent distribution index ID is required.

params._superToken: Supertoken of the underlying token we wish to stream.

params._DHPTx: Supertoken corresponding to the DHPT of the pool

params._message: Message reason for reactivation of the core.

returns._0: Address of the underlying/deposit token which needs to be deposited to the dHedge pool.

devdoc.title: Core contract for streaming into a dHedge pool.

calcUserUninvested(address,address).notice: Calculates uninvested token amount of a particular user.

checkCoreActive().notice: Checks if the core is active or not.

dHedgeDeposit(address).notice: Converts supertokens to underlying tokens and deposits them into dHedge pool.

distribute(address).notice: Distributes the DHPTx corresponding to a underlying token's deposits.

emergencyCloseStream(address,address).notice: Closes a supertoken stream if core is jailed or user is running low on balance. Any user's stream can be closed by anyone provided the app is jailed- or user doesn't have enough amount to stream for more than 12 hours.

emergencyWithdraw(address).notice: Function to withdraw a token in case of emergency.

getTokenDistIndices(address).notice: Gets the distribution indices corresponding to an underlying token.

getUserDistIndex(address,address).notice: Gets a user's assigned permanent distribution index for a supertoken stream.

initStreamToken(address).notice: Initialises an underlying token and it's supertoken for streaming into dHEDGE pool.

requireUpkeep().notice: Checks if deposit action can be performed.
